thread.title: BRIEF-Centerstate Bank Corp Says Board Of Co Increased Quarterly Cash Dividend On Common Stock From $0.06 Per Share To $0.10 Per Share

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Centerstate Bank Corp Says Board Of Co Increased Quarterly Cash Dividend On Common Stock From $0.06 Per Share To $0.10 Per Share

organizations.name: brief-centerstate bank corp says board of co

text:
Jan 19 (Reuters) - Centerstate Bank Corp:
* CENTERSTATE BANK CORP SAYS BOARD OF CO INCREASED QUARTERLY CASH DIVIDEND ON COMMON STOCK FROM $0.06 PER SHARE TO $0.10 PER SHARE - SEC FILING
* CENTERSTATE BANK CORP SAYS DUE TO TAX CUTS AND JOBS ACT, BOARD APPROVED CASH BONUS OF $1,000 FOR NON-OFFICER EMPLOYEES AS OF DEC 31, 2017 - SEC FILING Source text: ( bit.ly/2DqHWvz ) Further company coverage:
